word_mean: 普适性所代表的不是个别特殊现象，而是一类现象的普遍数量特征。

sentence.Network_en: It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
sentence.Network_cn: 矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中.

sentence.Network_en: I have been amazed at the universality of all of our experiences, whatever our origins, sex or age.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管我们的身世、性别和年龄各不相同，但令我惊讶的是我们都有着共同的经历。

sentence.Network_en: The beauty of Newton's method is its universality.
sentence.Network_cn: 牛顿法的优点是它的通用性.

无疑，“一般的”实践不等于要求“普遍性”（universality），即不要求是所有国家或其他国际主体无异议的实践。这意味着，一个国家可以受到其他国家通例的拘束，即使这.
普适性（universality）是一种常用的评价标准。具有普适性的主题不仅对此时此刻的人，而且对所有年龄的全体人类都有意义。

entry.def: Something that is universal relates to everyone in the world or everyone in a particular group or society.

example.ex: The insurance industry has produced its own proposals for universal health care...
example.tran: 保险业提出了自己的全民医疗保健方案。

example.ex: The desire to look attractive is universal.

entry.def: Something that is universal affects or relates to every part of the world or the universe.
A universal is a principle that applies in all cases or a characteristic that is present in all members of a particular class.

example.tran: 没有普遍适用的经济学原理。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being universal; existing everywhere
